group_1.textLeft: Because marriage, as you call it,@is nothing more than a contract.

group_1.textRight: Eh, a contract? Marriage is?

group_1.textLeft: Correct.

group_1.narration: "With marriage comes property, inheritance...@Various legally binding clauses, so I believe@calling it a single contract to be fair."
"Public subsidies, economic benefits,@social stability... Such advantages do in fact exist,@but at the same time choosing to share your life@with another creates its own disadvantages."
"Hence why I, personally,@hold no interest in the romance of marriage...@regardless of the pros and cons."

group_1.textLeft: And while many people state@that they marry due to love,
how does one prove that when@love is so ambiguously defined?

group_1.textRight: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]P-prove?!@[chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:302301:cheek_0][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]It's kind of hard to prove your feelings...

group_1.textLeft: How can you make a correct decision@with something so unclear?

group_1.textRight: W-well...umm...

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry, it wasn't my intention@to counter everyone's opinions.
This is why I thought it would be@better to not say anything.

group_1.textRight: No, I'm sorry too. I shouldn't@have forced you to answer.
Yeah...sorry, Masara.

group_1.textLeft: ...It isn't anyone's fault.

group_1.textRight: Ah! That's right!
Have you told your parents about@the wedding photo shoot yet?
Though it's just modeling, won't they want to@see their daughters dressed to the nines?

group_1.textLeft: Ehh, there's no way.
...But Kokoro...
The photographer asked us to get@parental consent just in case.

group_1.textRight: Now that you mention it, you're right...!@I forgot...
Then why not take that chance to@ask your mom and dad about it?

group_1.textLeft: Hm? About what?

group_1.textRight: How they got together, how their@marriage went...stuff like that!

group_1.textLeft: Uhh...that might be a little@awkward to ask in my home, though...

group_1.textRight: Ah―sorry...!@That was insensitive of me...

group_1.textLeft: Not at all, it's better than always@being afraid to say anything.
I'm sure it wouldn't hurt to ask them once.
I've been avoiding that conversation@too much myself anyway.
And I am a little curious...@How Mom and Dad used to be.
If you say so, then I'll ask@my parents when I return as well.

group_1.textRight: Yeah!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you both for sharing!
I'm feeling more motivated@for this photo shoot now!

group_1.textRight: Then I'm glad it worked out.
...Well, since we're already at it,@could you humor me one more time?
I have an interesting enhancement@I'd like you test on you two.

group_1.textLeft: ...Anything "interesting" coming from@Mitama is cause for concern...

group_1.textRight: It's okay, it's alright~@It's not anything bad.
...Well, if she wants to so badly,@why don't we give it a try?

group_1.textLeft: ...If you don't mind, Kokoro,@then I have no problem.

group_1.textRight: Alright then, here we gooo♪
There doesn't seem to be@anything unusual about it...

group_1.textLeft: What did you do?

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* A costume present from your Coordinator!

group_1.textLeft: It's going to be a wedding dress or something,@isn't it?!

group_1.textRight: Who knows...? How the costumes transform@depends on the feelings from these two.
I'm scared of what will happen...@[chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]but this might be kind of fun.

group_1.textLeft: ...Right.

group_1.textRight: Ah, we'll come see you two on@the day of the photo shoot,
so I would love to see your Magical Girl forms then,@if you don't mind.
I'll be looking forward to it!

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha, this is getting embarrassing...
